thread.section_title: AllGifts.ie Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of AllGifts.ie | allgifts.ie
thread.title: Maria O'Brien

author: Maria O'Brien
title: Maria O'Brien
text: I had ordered vouchers from the comfort of my home and had requested them to be posted to me. The following day I changed my mind as I work quite close to the AllGifts.ie office, so I contacted AllGifts.ie to see if I could change the delivery option. Sarah replied to my email almost immediately and had my vouchers ready for collection when I called soon after. I was warmly welcomed with a smile. I collected a second voucher the following day and had the same great service. I would definitely recommend AllGifts.ie to everyone!
